dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
dcterms:description: A modified version of the puddle world environment where the goal is to drive the agent from a starting position to the goal area while avoiding puddles. The state-space is [0, 10]Â², and the action-space allows movement in four cardinal directions.
dcterms:title: Puddle World

dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
A. G. Barto
dcterms:description: A classic control problem where the goal is to swing up a two-link pendulum by applying positive or negative torque to the joint between the two links. The task involves complex dynamics and requires a considerable amount of samples to be solved.
dcterms:title: Acrobot

dcterms:creator: A. Castelletti
S. Galelli
M. Restelli
R. Soncini-Sessa
dcterms:description: A real-world problem where the goal is to learn how to optimally control a water reservoir system. The objective is to learn a per-day water release policy that meets a given demand while keeping the water level below a flooding threshold.
dcterms:title: Water Reservoir Control
